question:
Which of the following activities can help to reduce the government's budget deficit?
  1. Implementation of Goods and Services Tax (GST)
  2. Rationalization of Subsidies
  3. Reduction in Income Tax
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Implementation of Goods and Services Tax (GST) could help government raise tax revenues and reduce fiscal deficit. Fiscal deficit can be reduced by rationalizing subsidies in different sectors. Reduction in Income Tax will reduce government's earnings and hence will increase budget deficit.
